title: Garfield Park lagoon being drained as search continues – Chicago Sun-Times
content:
Garfield Park lagoon being drained as search continuesChicago Sun-TimesChicago Department of Water Management trucks and workers also began to arrive at the Lagoon Tuesday morning as police continue to guard the perimeter of the park.
